comments.author: bettercrypto
comments.body: It's really hard to win at any casino we go to gamble. Oftentimes, whether it's online or land-based casinos, the house edge lets a novice gambler who enters their casino platform win first.    Until the house edge sees that the gambler is entertained and they see that he enjoys winning all the time until it becomes a habit of their gamblers. There are still winners but of course, there are still more losers.
